name: Future Paths
description:
Connect to your future to win the game.

Navigate through a small maze to find your future self(s). You control not only your current self but also future versions of yourself. Find a sequence of moves, so that the character in the first (leftmost) timezone ends up in the start position of the character in the second timezone, while simultaneously moving the character in the second timezone to its goal. Try to minimize the number of moves you take to solve the level.

Controls: use the arrow keys to move your character.

Sound FX Credits:

Button click and win sound obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Movement and game over sound by phoenix1291 (License: public domain)

Music: 

Wake Up by İlker Yalçıner (ilkeryalciner.com), License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
